DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare effect 91-day oral contraceptive ( OC ) 28-day OC regimen bone mineral density ( BMD ) adolescent female .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study Evaluate Effects 91-day Oral Contraceptive Bone Mineral Density Adolescent Females
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize either 91-day OC 28-day OC . Participants seek hormonal contraception meet eligibility criterion serve control group . Duration study study participant approximately 13 month .
DOC.criteria: Healthy postmenarchal adolescent female 1218 year old , nonpregnant , nonlactating Regular spontaneous menstrual cycle Body mass index ( BMI ) : 18 kg/m² < 30 kg/m² , weight < 200 lb Others dictate Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) approve protocol Any contraindication use oral contraceptive History previous clinically significant adverse event take hormonal contraceptive Use medication could significantly interfere study assessment Others dictate FDAapproved protocol
